channel.title: [Server Status] Spent nearly 3 weeks for nothing?
channel.description: I've spent nearly 3 weeks programming my server. I just got finished registering, when I realized that my server doesn't allow capital letters in the password. When verification password has capitals in it.. So now I'm guessing my server won't get populated and the server status won't post it. Just thought I'd ask if there's a way for this to not come in the way of my ad being published?

item.title: [Server Status] Spent nearly 3 weeks for nothing?
item.dc:creator: @it0ken1 it0ken1
item.description:
@it0ken1 wrote:

I’ve spent nearly 3 weeks programming my server.
I just got finished registering, when I realized that my server doesn’t allow capital letters in the password.
When verification password has capitals in it…
So now I’m guessing my server won’t get populated and the server status won’t post it. Just thought I’d ask if there’s a way for this to not come in the way of my ad being published?

Read full topic
item.source: [Server Status] Spent nearly 3 weeks for nothing?
